seometa.title: Refund Policy: Learn About Our Refund Process | DET Practice
seometa.description: Discover DET Practice's Refund Policy: Learn how we handle refund requests, eligibility criteria, and the process for obtaining a refund. Read more about our policies now.

q1.a1: Thank you for choosing and purchasing our services. We strive to provide the best learning experience for our customers. However, if you are not entirely satisfied with your purchase, we're here to help.

q2.title: Eligibility for Refunds
q2.a1: • Member Services: Refund requests for member services must be made within 3 days of purchase.
q2.a2: • Accessed Content: If you have not accessed more than 20 questions, you are eligible for a refund.
q2.a3: • Digital Courses: Once a digital product is downloaded or accessed, it is considered used and used products cannot be refunded.

q3.title: How to Request a Refund / Cancel Subscription
q3.a1: To request a refund, please follow these steps:
q3.a2: 1.Cancel Subscription: Login to your account, find and click the "Manage your billing" link at the bottom of the membership page. You will be redirected to a confirmation page where you can confirm your decision to unsubscribe.
q3.a3: 2.Contact Our Support: Contact our customer support team at support{'@'}detpractice.com with your order number and the reason for the refund request.
q3.a4: 3.Our team will review your request and respond within 3 business days.

q4.title: Exclusions
q4.a1: The following are not eligible for refunds:
q4.a2: • Digital products that have been downloaded.
q4.a3: • Products and services purchased through third-party vendors.
